name: United We Stand (AnonymousKing)
description:
United We Stand is a platform/puzzle game. Its gameplay involves controlling three protagonists controlled at the same time while aligned. Game made in two days for GMTK game jam 2021.

Three individuals wake up in strange rooms that refer to colors without knowing how they got there. Separated by barriers they only have one way out of this strange place, TOGETHER! With the help of two strange drones they now have the ability to telepathically contact each other so they can communicate and work in harmony in order to get out of their respective halls. 

Credits: Youtube Audio Library 

Songs used: Interstellar Mood- Nico Staf, Landing - Godmode and Whole Tone Limbo - Godmode.

How to play:

W A S D/ Arrow Keys = Basic moves

Each character can only move if they are inside the drone area. Keep this in mind when solving puzzles.

Hope you like it, rate it if you can and thanks for playing!
